name: updateRole
shortDescription: Updates the translations and metadata of an existing role
description: This method updates the translations and metadata of an existing role.
signatures: Void updateRole(Integer roleId, Struct translations, Struct metadata)

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the role as returned by createRole() or getRoles().

parameters.name: translations
parameters.description: The name of the role in different languages. The keys are the lower case ISO 639-1 language codes and the upper case ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes seperated by a dash (e. g. en-US or fr-FR). The values are the role names in the different languages.
